setup.speed:
fast= responsive app / more change of crashing OpenSong
slow= less responsive app / less change of crashing OpenSong

search.stopwarn: A presentation is already running, do you want to stop it?

song.choose2: Select a song from the bundle

info.line3: This app is build with onsen.io and vanilla javascript
info.line4: OpenSong is a free, open-source software application created to manage lyrics, chords, lead sheets, overheads, computer projection, and more. More info on www.opensong.org
info.line6:
Opensong must be running with Automation API enabled
To enable, goto in OpenSong to 'Settings' - 'General Settings' - 'System' tab.
Under 'Automation API' tick 'Enable remote control server'
info.line7: Insert song requiries OpenSong 2.2.7 or newer (fails silently on older versions)
info.line8: All other functions require OpenSong 2 or newer
